name: Impact SDLC
description: Jira-like project management tool enhanced with AI features for auto-generating test cases and source code.
contributions: Designed and developed full backend: task management, AI integrations, user access control
Developed Node.js/Express APIs for projects, tasks, test generation, and code workflows
Integrated LLM AIs for generation features and deploying on Azure
Implemented secure user authentication and role-based access
Managed deployment end-to-end using Azure DevOps and Docker containers

name: Gen AI Innovations
description: Hands-on exploration and deployment of cutting-edge Generative AI models with GPU optimization.
contributions: Set up and optimized GPU drivers and frameworks (CUDA, cuDNN) for model execution efficiency
Successfully deployed Microsoft's 1-bit model on local Ubuntu GPU
Scripted and automated the end-to-end process for model deployment, inference, and benchmarking
Integrated HuggingFace Transformer models, and assessed the impact of quantization
Developed, tested, and exposed FastAPI endpoints for inference as part of a scalable backend service

name: SEO Bot
description: Automatic blog writing bot generating content based on user topics using Ollama AI with Google Indexing integration.
contributions: Developed primary backend services with Node.js and Express
Integrated Google Indexing API for automated publishing
Managed deployment using AWS and Docker

name: Political Sentiment Analysis
description: Final year project analyzing political sentiment from social media data using NLP techniques to gauge political trends.
contributions: Developed a political sentiment analysis tool for final year project
Performed sentiment analysis on social media data using NLP techniques
Implemented machine learning algorithms to gauge political trends
